tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE secure_transactions (
  transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  lender_id UUID NOT NULL,
  borrower_id UUID NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  encrypted_channel TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE lenders (
    lender_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lender_name VARCHAR(255),
    lender_email VARCHAR(255),
    lender_public_key TEXT,
    lender_private_key TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE borrowers (
    borrower_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    borrower_name VARCHAR(255),
    borrower_email VARCHAR(255),
    borrower_public_key TEXT,
    borrower_private_key TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE lenders ( 
    lender_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    lender_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
    lender_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
    lender_password VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL 
)

CREATE TABLE borrowers ( 
    borrower_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    borrower_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
    borrower_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
    borrower_password VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL 
)

CREATE TABLE transactions ( 
    transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL, 
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 
    encrypted_channel VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL 
)

CREATE TABLE Borrowers (
    borrower_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    borrower_name VARCHAR(255),
    encrypted_channel TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    loan_id UUID,
    lender_id UUID,
    borrower_id UUID,
    amount DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    encrypted_channel TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
	transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	lender_id INT NOT NULL,
	borrower_id INT NOT NULL,
	transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
	encrypted_data VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL
);
